pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Beach is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/beach)Beach$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is composed mostly of Sand and Water, but but is covered with a layer of snow and water was turned into $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ice)Ice$(/l).

$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seal)Seals$(/l) can be found lying on the ice of these beaches.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Snowy Beach$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
